title: olvin
author: olvin
content: We recently started new website of p2p trading & crypto payment system called as Gpayin. Not sure how to bring it to crypto community( publicity). Any suggestions will be helpful.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Since you're in the forum, the best way to promote is through signature campaign. If you haven't heard of it yet, please refer to the link.Signature Campaign Guidelines (read this before starting or joining a campaign)Aside from that, although it's not that much of difference there's also Bounties. For you to have an idea, check the section:  Bounties (Altcoins)

comments.author: ice18
comments.body: You can start a bounty campaign here and pay in stable coin if you dont have utility token or if you have enough funds find a crypto influencer in social media especially twitter and youtube this is one of the most effective way to promote your business today.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Rather than run a signature campaign, it's better if you create the official ANN of your project first. You will get many feedback and people will ask some question regarding your project, including criticism and red tagged if your project are suspicious.If you feel you don't get enough feedback, you can start a review campaign. If there's no problem after that, you can run a signature campaign to promote your project more widely in this forum.

comments.author: alik111
comments.body: There area many ways to promote new P2P trading platform and crypto payment site like by launching ann thread, launching bounty campaign or any signature campaign in this forum. You can also launch some reward campaign like review campaign or video campaign. Hope these ways will help you to promote perfectly in this forum. You can also get help from crypto marketers and they will promote your website for a little payment.

comments.author: reizella28
comments.body: Here in the forum you could see a lot of member wearing a signature promotions. There's also in the marketplace here that you could ask for collaboration for promotion. If you want to save money and promote by yourself then other social media accounts is also useful like Twitter since there's a lot of investor and trader that are surfing in the Twitter.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Just as other members have suggested adding to that, I will advise you to prepare detailed information regarding the platform, then go through the service board where you can choose a skilled individual (bounty, signature managers, and graphic designers) who will help you make your publication perfect and reach out to your target audience. Starting up an ANN thread will really be helpful; that's always the beginning of some successful projects and the end of some scam projects. There will be a review, questions will be asked, and suggestions will also be made. We have lots of members here who are looking out for the safety of the crypto community; if anything suspicious is detected, you will be questioned for clarification. If you are really determined to create awareness for your new project, you can start right now and hit up a manager who will give you the best and make sure you achieve what you are out here for.
